attributes.action: not introduce charges for household rubbish collection as this would inrease fly tipping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If households were charged for their waste to be collected some people would dump their rubbish in the street or elsewhere to avoid the charges. Others may try to put theirs into neighbours bins to get out of paying. People should be encouraged to dispose of waste responsibly, not discouraged.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
